sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for determining melting point using a melting point apparatus.
sections.scope: Applicable to determination of melting point of solid substances in the Pharmaceutical Chemistry laboratory.
procedure: Ensure the melting point apparatus is clean and switched OFF.
Fill the capillary tube with finely powdered sample.
Place the capillary tube in the heating block.
Switch ON the apparatus and start heating gradually.
Observe the temperature at which the sample starts melting.
Switch OFF the apparatus after use.
sections.precautions: Do not heat rapidly. Handle capillary tubes carefully to avoid breakage.
